Title: Prohibits the charging of certain membership fees or rent for coworking spaces or shared workspaces during a state disaster emergency
Summary: Prohibits the charging of membership fees or rent for any coworking space or shared workspace during a state disaster emergency including when a consumer can demonstrate a financial hardship.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the charging of certain membership fees or rent for coworking spaces or shared workspaces during a state disaster emergency
